TEXT.TITLE: ENS BIO LOGICALS INC <BIOLF> YEAR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 22 cts vs not given Net 1.6 mln vs 1.4 mln Revs 35 mln vs 14 mln NOTE: 1985 results restated from originally reported loss of 1.6 mln dlrs or 28 cts a share. 1986 figures reflect reverse takeover accounting to include 12-month results of the Rose Group, but only three months for Tele-Radio Systems Ltd and Ens Bio Logicals. Reuter
